mapper.select: SELECT c.title, a.username, b.name as real_name, a.os, a.platform, a.browser, a.version, a.access_time FROM menu_access_log a join users b on a.username = b.username join menu c on a.name = c.name where DateDiff(dd, access_time, getdate()) <= 7 order by access_time desc

select CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), access_time, 120) as access_date, count(1) AS total_count from menu_access_log where DateDiff(dd, access_time, getdate()) <= 30 group by CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), access_time, 120)
SELECT c.title, count(*) as total_count FROM menu_access_log a join menu c on a.name = c.name where DateDiff(dd, access_time, getdate()) <= 7 group by c.title
